channel.title: Need help with server please read (Reward) please try
channel.description:
Ok yes I have a reward for who ever helps me since last time no one did a thing and I had to go to silab to find out no one got the reward the reward is a lvl 95 runescape account if you can help me thanks.
Ok and don't post rubbish like did you save as ofcorse i did -.-
ok well i want to add a command so i make it and yes i am very sure it is a working one that isn't messed up then when i add this to client.java under another command and again yes it is right under. and log in to try the command it wont work even when i try to edit what the npc says same thing doesn't work please help me and thanks :D

im sorry but i dont no how to fix the errors seems like somin to do with shop voids? or booleans? maybe a missing bracket thts usally the problem

item.title: Need help with server please read (Reward) please try
item.dc:creator: @underdogz underdogz
item.description:
@underdogz wrote:

I did find a custom command here is what i found

[code] /* PUBLIC COMMANDS (FOR ALL USERS) */

    if (command.startsWith("home") && (absX <= 3620)) {
        teleportToX = 3013;
        teleportToY = 3356;
        sendMessage("Welcome home");
    }[/code]

so i added

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter") && playerRights >=0) { sendMessage("there is your starter"); addItem(995,15000000); )
right under it so it looked like this

[code]/* PUBLIC COMMANDS (FOR ALL USERS) */

    if (command.startsWith("home") && (absX <= 3620)) {
        teleportToX = 3013;
        teleportToY = 3356;
        sendMessage("Welcome home");
    }
 if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter") && playerRights >=0)
        {
            sendMessage("there is your starter");
                addItem(995,15000000);
        )

[/code]

is that right or what?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server please read (Reward) please try
item.dc:creator: @underdogz underdogz
item.description:
@underdogz wrote:

[quote=“WRX`, post:4, topic:227553”][quote author=underdogz link=topic=299018.msg2401742#msg2401742 date=1219490996]
yea when i run and compile no errors come up and im sure its right let me send you a example or a command i made like this one

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter") && playerRights >=0) { sendMessage("there is your starter"); addItem(995,15000000); )

umm… so idk if that wronge then FFS i have to get better
[/quote]

Try putting it right under:

public void customcommand()

(UNDERNEATH ANY “actionAmount++” Etc.)

Then compile and try.[/quote]

1 thing im not sure bout do i put the code in client.java cuz i can’t find

public void customcommand()

in client.java because that is were i usally put it

Read full topic

[quote=“underdogz, post:3, topic:227553”]yea when i run and compile no errors come up and im sure its right let me send you a example or a command i made like this one

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter") && playerRights >=0) { sendMessage("there is your starter"); addItem(995,15000000); )

umm… so idk if that wronge then FFS i have to get better :P[/quote]

Try putting it right under:

public void customcommand()

(UNDERNEATH ANY “actionAmount++” Etc.)

Then compile and try.
